article_text:
This is the best image we've seen of how the "polar vortex" has infiltrated the U.S., causing the cold snap we are experiencing. Blue is the freezing line:

The image above was tweeted out by AccuWeather's Anthony Sagliani. He created it using the Living Earth app (available for iPhone, iPad and Mac).
